title: Requirements for Corrosion Control
content:
Requirements for Corrosion Control

§ 255.452 - Applicability to converted pipelines
§ 255.453 - General

§ 255.459 - External corrosion control: examination of buried pipeline when exposed

§ 255.463 - External corrosion control: cathodic protection
§ 255.465 - External corrosion control: monitoring
§ 255.467 - External corrosion control: electrical isolation
§ 255.469 - External corrosion control: test stations
§ 255.471 - External corrosion control: test leads
§ 255.473 - External corrosion control: interference currents
§ 255.475 - Internal corrosion control: general
§ 255.476 - Internal corrosion control: design and construction of transmission line
§ 255.477 - Internal corrosion control: monitoring
§ 255.479 - Atmospheric corrosion control: general
§ 255.481 - Atmospheric corrosion control: monitoring
§ 255.483 - Remedial measures: general
§ 255.485 - Remedial measures: transmission lines

§ 255.489 - Remedial measures: cast iron and ductile iron pipelines

§ 255.491 - Corrosion control records

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
